llm_response.description: The image shows extensive retinal hemorrhages, microaneurysms, and cotton wool spots. There is also evidence of venous beading. The overall appearance suggests a high degree of diabetic retinopathy.

The retinal vessels appear somewhat irregular. The overall appearance suggests a moderate to severe diabetic retinopathy.
